Code: 
*121*51#

item.title: Get Free Zee5 subscription to all Airtel users
item.author: invalid@example.com (Elliott)
item.dc:creator: Elliott
item.content:encoded:
Hi All, This trick to get ZEE5 subscriptions for all Airtel mobile users.

Follow the steps:
  • Download Airtel Thanks app from Play Store
  • Open the app & go to benefits section you will find – Zee5 subscription
  • Now Enter your name , Date of birth , gender , it will ask you for an OTP
  • Generate your OTP and you get Zee5 subscription for free

item.title: Airtel announce to offer complimentary Xstream box for One Airtel Subscribers.
item.author: invalid@example.com (Heisenberg)
item.dc:creator: Heisenberg
item.content:encoded:
Telecom company Bharti Airtel is now offering a complimentary Xstream box to One Airtel subscribers, as reported by Telecomtalk. Xstream Airtel Android TV-based set-top box charges only of Rs 3639 for new users.

Also, One Airtel plan clubs together various Airtel services, such as postpaid mobile services, DTH, Xstream Fiber broadband service and landline into one bill.

».login and select TCP Protocol » » and put port 443
» leave proxy or port tab

item.title: Airtel Free 3G Internet Tricks March 2016
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sahiljani)
item.dc:creator: Sahiljani
item.content:encoded:
Latest Working Airtel 3G / 4G Free Internet Trick
  • First check Airtel 3G Internet balance and note it somewhere.
  • First Download Opera Mini Handler
  • Open Opera Mini, Go to Settings >>More >> Mobile Network Settings
  • Now Select Your Subscription.
  • Then Go to Access Point Name.
  • Now Go To Option>> New APN.
Now Enter this APN Settings for Airtel.

Name : Any

APN : airtelgprs.com

Proxy : 141.0.11.253

Port : 80

APN Setting 2

Name : Any

APN ...

Airtel Free 3G Internet Tricks March 2016

item.title: airtel tv app 1gb 4g data free
item.author: invalid@example.com (l0n3ly)
item.dc:creator: l0n3ly
item.content:encoded:
Download airtel tv app and get 1Gb 4g data for free with 3days validity .
Steps-
1. First of all, you need to Download Airtel TV App from play store.
2.Install & open
3.Sign up using your Airtel Mobile number
4.You will get an instant notification “Congrats..!! 1GB 4G/3G Data for 3 days has been credited to your account. To check balance Dial *121*2#.”

That’s it, 1 GB free...

airtel tv app 1gb 4g data free

item.title: Airtel direct 4G speed
item.author: invalid@example.com (chhewang)
item.dc:creator: chhewang
item.content:encoded:
[PRO]
1-Firstly 2G Unlimited Recharge

2-3G pack of 1 month
3-Finishing all the data should be left only 0.15
4-When you lose your 3G network will run, then you have to bring 2G network
5-Activate 3G network by calling customer care
6-After the 3G network add number *129*101#
7- Now to activate 4g service send mail =121@airtel.com
sir please activate 4G service my number
8-After sending the mail, you will receive a call and then 4G service will be activated 4G
now enjoy 4G unlimited
[/PRO]

item.title: Airtel TCP connected not receiving data.

item.content:encoded:

In Airtel 3g and 4g, Droidvpn is connecting without any extra setting, just select TCP.But the problem is that after successful connection ,it isn't receiving any data. I have also tried to reinstall tap driver but it didn't helped,
Please Suggest some solution
